name: SugarCRM
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Commercial open source customer relationship management (CRM). CRM software for sales force automation and customer support deployed on demand or on site.

matches.text: Possible Cross Site Request Forgery (XSRF) Attack Detected

matches.regexp: (?-mix:\* SugarCRM is a customer relationship management program developed by[\s]+ \* SugarCRM, Inc\. Copyright \(C\) 2004-([\d]{4}) SugarCRM Inc\.)
